From interface java.security.Key abstract String getAlgorithm() Returns the name of the algorithm of this key. abstract byte[] getEncoded() Returns the encoded form of this key, or null if encoding is not supported by this key. abstract String getFormat() Returns the name of the format used to encode this key, or null if it can not be encoded.
